name: TerminalDirectory
description: Allows project owners to deploy proxy contracts that can pay them when receiving funds directly.

eventDecorators.name: DeployAddress
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity.

eventDecorators.name: SetPayerPreferences
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity.

eventDecorators.name: SetTerminal
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity.

functionDecorators.name: addressesOf
functionDecorators.description: A list of all direct payment addresses for the specified project ID.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project to get direct payment addresses for.

returnDecorators.description: A list of direct payment addresses for the specified project ID.

functionDecorators.name: beneficiaryOf
functionDecorators.description: For each address, the address that will be used as the beneficiary of direct payments made.

functionDecorators.name: deployAddress
functionDecorators.description: Allows anyone to deploy a new direct payment address for a project.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project to deploy a direct payment address for.

parameterDecorators.name: _memo
parameterDecorators.description: The note to use for payments made through the new direct payment address.

functionDecorators.name: projects
functionDecorators.description: The Projects contract which mints ERC-721's that represent project ownership and transfers.

functionDecorators.name: setPayerPreferences
functionDecorators.description: Allows any address to pre set the beneficiary of their payments to any direct payment address, and to pre set whether to prefer to unstake tickets into ERC20's when making a payment.

functionDecorators.name: setTerminal
functionDecorators.description: Update the juicebox terminal that payments to direct payment addresses will be forwarded for the specified project ID.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project to set a new terminal for.

functionDecorators.name: terminalOf
functionDecorators.description: For each project ID, the juicebox terminal that the direct payment addresses are proxies for.

functionDecorators.name: unstakedTicketsPreferenceOf
functionDecorators.description: For each address, the preference of whether ticket will be auto claimed as ERC20s when a payment is made.
